textAfterTable: MicroData Summary for Aloysius Ferdinandus Zichem: Bishop Aloysius Ferdinandus Zichem C.SS.R. (born 28 Feb 1933) Bishop Emeritus of Paramaribo Please contact the Bishop through the Diocese of Paramaribo. a priest for 54.4 years a bishop for 44.9 years Principal Consecrator: Bishop Stephanus Jozef Maria Magdalena Kuijpers, C.SS.R. † Bishop of Paramaribo, Suriname Principal Co-Consecrators: Bishop Patrick Webster, O.S.B. † Titular Bishop of Ottocium Bishop Arnold Boghaert, C.SS.R. † Bishop of Roseau, Dominica Bishop Alfred Aimé Léon Marie, C.S.Sp. † Bishop of Cayenne (Cajenna), French Guyana Bernard Jan Cardinal Alfrink † Archbishop of Utrecht Bishop Joannes Maria Michael Holterman, O.P. † Bishop of Willemstad, Netherlands Antilles Archbishop Luigi Barbarito Titular Archbishop of Fiorentino Archbishop Gordon Anthony Pantin, C.S.Sp. † Archbishop of Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago Bishop Richard Lester Guilly, S.J. † Bishop of Georgetown, Guyana Bishop Samuel Emmanuel Carter, S.J. † Titular Bishop of Cenculiana Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Bishop Stephanus Jozef Maria Magdalena Kuijpers, C.SS.R. † (1946) Bishop of Paramaribo, Suriname
